about_the_game:
Join the ultimate card battle to rescue humanity and protect the animal kingdom!

Key Highlights:
Unpredictable gameplay with the option to build your own deck
Embark on an epic Campaign Mode featuring 24 challenging missions

Gameplay Overview:
Step into a world divided between humans and animals, and your mission is to maintain the delicate balance between their populations.

Each game consists of multiple rounds, where an AI-controlled threat card is unleashed, altering the populations of humans and animals worldwide. To counteract these effects, you'll be dealt 1-4 cards per round, allowing you to mitigate the impact of the threat card. But here's the twist: while the threat card only takes effect at the end of the round, your player cards can influence populations not only during that round but also for the next two rounds. Strategy and careful card play are paramount. Don't forget to stay vigilant until the very end, as any remaining population modifiers will come into play. Brace yourself for the unexpected!

As if that weren't enough, the boundaries for each population may shift during the game, adding an extra layer of excitement. Plus, there's a round timer to keep you on your toes. Quick reflexes and sharp thinking are essential for your triumph!

To navigate precarious situations, players have the option to apply modifiers to their cards, allowing them to regain control from the brink. Use these modifiers wisely, as their availability is limited and must be managed tactfully.
